Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our top-of-the-line product that has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards. This exceptional item is not just a product; it's an investment in quality and excellence. Given its unique features and unparalleled performance, I believe its value exceeds $10000. I am offering this remarkable product to you at a special introductory price of $9500. Don't miss out on this opportunity to own a piece that truly stands out. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $9,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $9,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $15,000
